ログイン・新規登録

8月

23

 Go 1.13 Release Party in Tokyo

主催 : GoCon運営
ハッシュタグ ：#go113party
募集内容

Gophers

無料

抽選（2019/08/16）
292/150人

イベントの説明

Let's celebrate the release of Go 1.13. We will hold this event at Mercari Tokyo Office. We're looking forward to celebrating it with you.

If you want to give a presentation, let @tenntenn or other organizers know it.

Connecting other venues

We have a plan to connect other venues around Japan. If you can provide a place for the release party, please contact @tenntenn :)

  • Okayama: https://okayamago.connpass.com/event/139882/
  • Fukuoka: https://fukuokago.connpass.com/event/139929/
  • Osaka: https://umedago.connpass.com/event/140197/
  • Sendai: https://techplay.jp/event/742699
  • Okinawa: TBD

Time table

Time Content
19:00 - 19:30 Open
19:30 - 19:40 What's new Go1.13? by tenntenn
19:40 - 20:00 GopherCon 2019 Report by knsh14
20:00 - 20:20 What's new sync.Pool in Go1.13 by huydx
20:20 - 20:30 Break
20:30 - 20:50 Generics in Go by linyows (Fukuoka.go)
20:50 - 21:00 testing.B.ReportMetric by ymotongpoo
21:00 - 21:10 by shibu_jp
21:10 - 21:40 After Party

Reception

The event reception would be located on LL floor of Roppoingi Hills Mori Tower. At the reception, you should get a sticker which is required to pass the security gate. Please prepare your reception number in advance of it.

Sponsors

  • Mercari, Inc.
